features: PROTECT & STRENGTHEN YOUR HAIR- It features a unique blend of camellia oils and natural extracts that seal up split ends and prevent hair breakage. It is an excellent emollient to keep your hair hydrated and supple
IMPROVING BLOOD FLOW TO THE SCALP – The pomegranate has been found to strengthen hair follicles by stimulating circulation and improving blood flow to the scalp.
EFFECT OF PROMOTING HAIR GROWTH – The schisandra is a plant that works as an “adaptogen” and has been used as a medicine. It is known for its effect of promoting hair growth for men and women

NOURISHES EXTREMELY DAMAGED HAIR AND HAIR ROOTS– Have you experienced your hair to be cut and break while brushing? Then, this product may be the answer. It is specially made for severely damaged hair and to deeply condition it. It helps to turn coarse, frizzy, dry hair to manageable and silky hair

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this product. I’ve been using it since the beginning of the year, and it’s just amazing. With American shampoo and conditioner, my hair always felt heavy, and greasy. Not to mention my dry scalp was awful, even using specific shampoos and conditioners for dry scalp. One use of this, and there was an immediate difference. My hair felt so much lighter, cleaner, and my dry scalp wasn’t nearly as bad as it was. With previous shampoo and conditioners, I’d HAVE to wash every other day. With this one? I only have to wash twice a week. I can go 3 days maybe more without my hair being greasy nor my dry scalp affecting me too much. My hair has never felt so good. It does have a pretty funky and strong smell. Can be compared to a cigarette, but not nearly as gross. But you get used to it after awhile. Eventually it’ll start smelling great. As far as hair loss is concerned, my hair still falls out pretty consistently, but that may be due to other underlying issues, so I don’t have much input on that. But it’s a great product and I will never use any other product for my hair again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gentle and effective
reviews.reviewText: I have short white hair which is different textured from before when it was black. My white hair has a more dry and stiff feeling, sticks out and it’s unmanageable. From the first time using this shampoo that all changed, now it’s much softer and feels so very nice when I run my fingers through it. I’m 75 years old and this shampoo is the first product that actually makes a difference. Thank you to the company that makes this fabulous shampoo!! It doesn’t need a conditioner, it great just using it alone. I absolutely love the light, fresh fragrance, it’s not typical and there’s nothing wrong with that at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Highly recommend this shampoo and this brand! I have noticed significant improvement in my hair. Ever since using this brand shampoo, I have not had dandruff.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Slowed Hair Loss In One Use
reviews.reviewText: Tagline says it all. I purchased this for hair loss, and after the very first wash, my fallout lessened by half. After nearly two weeks, has been reduced to nearly normal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hair feels great
reviews.reviewText: I used this after using another product from this brand and switched to this one since I didn't like the smell as much. Works great for my hair and isnt aggressive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Definitely notice a difference in strength & softness of my hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not a huge fan of the smell, but great for my hair
reviews.reviewText: I've been hearing good things about this product, so I finally decided to check it out! I'm definitely not a huge fan of the smell. It's very herby and kind of smells like men's shampoo, which I just don't really like in general since I like more flowery scents. However, it is doing it's job on the hair reparing side of things. My hair feels super hydrated and soft after I wash it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2023
